feed.title: Nautical Backup Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Nautical Backup: v2.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Added better logic for Nautical to skip itself. @wedge-kc identified an issue https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/issues/225 where Nautical was trying to back itself up and therefore would stop its own container. This issue should be fixed now.

  • Better logic to skip self by @Minituff in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/226
  • Update docs by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/220
  • Update dependency black to v24.4.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/214
  • Update dependency pytest to v8.1.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/221
  • Update dependency pydantic to v2.7.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/223
  • Update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.5.20 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/218

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/compare/v2.3.0...v2.3.1

entry.title: New release for Nautical Backup: v2.3.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

This release contains mostly package updates and some small bug fixes -> https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/276

What Else Changed

  • Update minituff/nautical-backup Docker tag to v2.3.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/227
  • Update dependency fastapi to v0.110.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/228
